means.word_mean: 非常贵重的;无法估价,无价的

entry.tran: 非常宝贵的;极为有用的
entry.def: If you describe something as invaluable, you mean that it is extremely useful.

example.ex: I was able to gain invaluable experience over that year...
example.tran: 在那一年里我有幸获得了非常宝贵的经验。

example.ex: The research should prove invaluable in the study of linguistics...
example.tran: 该调查研究在语言学研究领域的重要性应该会得到证实。

auth_sentence.content: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.
auth_sentence.res_content: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.

auth_sentence.content: The ideas have been invaluable to my clinical work.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ideas have been invaluable to my clinical work.

means.word_mean: 无法估计的, 非常宝贵的,极有用的,无价的

sentences.en: A computer would have been invaluable for this job.
sentences.cn: 一台计算机对这个工作的作用会是无法估计的。

sentences.en: This information was invaluable to him.
sentences.cn: 这个消息对他来说是非常宝贵的。

jushi.chinese: 一台计算机对这个工作的作用是无法估计的。

jushi.chinese: 对他来说,这个消息是非常宝贵的。
